name: The Mausoleum of King Deshret (In Effect)
description: Until this Round ends, for every 1 card drawn on this side of the field, 1 Forbidden Knowledge will be created immediately and randomly placed within that deck.
descriptionraw: Until this Round ends, for every 1 card drawn on this side of the field, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K2004]</color> will be created immediately and randomly placed within that deck.
descriptionreplaced: Until this Round ends, for every 1 card drawn on this side of the field, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Forbidden Knowledge</color> will be created immediately and randomly placed within that deck.
